name: Tree of Sisyphus
description:
Exist

Rise to face the primitive hostility of this world. Remain in this absurd cycle. A short game about the struggle itself. 

Tools of persistence
  • Grow your leaves, flourish against the wind. (Hold A/Up arrow/LMB) 
  • Sacrifice leaves, assert your existence. (Hold D/Down arrow/RMB)
  • It's not that deep. (Escape key)
One must imagine the tree happy.

MacOs executable might require additional permissions as I don't have an Apple Developer ID, app is signed but not notarized (guide)
